review: Apple TV is a great concept. Unfortunately, it doesn't actually work. Air Play, the technology it uses to connect devices to it, doesn't actually work. I have three modern apple devices, a laptop (MacBook Pro), and iPad Air, and an iPhone 5. The laptop can connect to the Apple TV, but the other two cannot.  Hours on the phone with Apple support, and their only "fix" is to reboot everything repeatedly. But it doesn't actually fix the problem.This technology doesn't work. Find an alternative.
